## PubSubOpts interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PubSubOpts<A, B> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [equiv](./rstream.pubsubopts.equiv.md) | <code>Predicate2&lt;B&gt;</code> | Equivalence check for topic values. Should return truthy result if given topics are considered equal. |
|  [id](./rstream.pubsubopts.id.md) | <code>string</code> | Optional subscription ID for the PubSub instance. |
|  [topic](./rstream.pubsubopts.topic.md) | <code>Fn&lt;B, any&gt;</code> | Topic function. Incoming values will be routed to topic subscriptions using this function's return value. |
|  [xform](./rstream.pubsubopts.xform.md) | <code>Transducer&lt;A, B&gt;</code> | Optional transformer for incoming values. If given, <code>xform</code> will be applied first and the transformed value passed to the <code>topic</code> fn. |
